Game.Name: Best Friends- My Horse
Game.Plot: You and your horse a winning team in fantastic 3D! Care for your own horse with 3D effects! Give it all your tender love and take part in exciting tournaments. Create your own dream horse and choose from breeds like Friesian, Andalusian and Arabian. Take the reins and ride on your horse by using motion controls. Show your skills on 10 show jumping courses, and try to master all obstacles with the right timing. Lovingly groom your horse, massage it, hose it down, feed it and clean its hooves. Breed cute foals by choosing the parents cart horse, crossbred horse or thoroughbred. Train your foals in the riding hall, and reward them with carrots from your garden. Buy numerous accessories, place them on your horse and participate in glamorous beauty contests. Create your perfect horse with the editor, including all breeds and accessories. -Use StreetPass to breed virtual horses with other players -Collect Play Coins, and hire somebody to complete tasks for you -Photo feature: take a photo of yourself for your profile
